title: Authentic Pasta Carbonara
description: A classic Italian dish that combines spaghetti with a creamy sauce made from eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add spaghetti and cook until al dente, according to package instructions.
While the pasta is cooking, dice the pancetta into small pieces.
In a large skillet over medium heat, add the olive oil and pancetta. Cook until the pancetta is crispy and golden.
In a mixing bowl, whisk together the egg yolks, grated Parmesan cheese, and black pepper until well combined.
Once the pasta is cooked, reserve about 1 cup of pasta water and then drain the pasta.
Immediately add the hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, tossing to combine.

Remove the skillet from heat, and quickly add the egg mixture to the pasta, stirring vigorously to create a creamy sauce. If needed, add reserved pasta water a little at a time to reach desired consistency.
Serve immediately with additional grated Parmesan cheese and freshly cracked black pepper on top.
